mapper.select:
/* scmActivityFundMapper.selectScmActivityFundList */
SELECT T.CLM_NO, T.MEM_ACC_ID, T.MEM_ACC_NAME, T.CLM_MONTH, T.REQST_DT, 'MYR' AS CUR, T.TOT_AMT, T.APPV_PRCSS_STUS_CODE, T.APPV_PRCSS_STUS, T.APPV_PRCSS_DT FROM (SELECT T1.CLM_NO, T1.MEM_ACC_ID, T2.MEM_ACC_NAME, T1.CLM_MONTH, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.APPV_PRCSS_NO, T4.REQST_DT, Nvl (T4.APPV_PRCSS_STUS, 'T') AS APPV_PRCSS_STUS_CODE, Nvl (( CASE T4.APPV_PRCSS_STUS WHEN 'R' THEN 'Request' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Approve In-Progress' WHEN 'A' THEN 'Approved' WHEN 'J' THEN 'Rejected' END ), 'Temporary Save') AS APPV_PRCSS_STUS, T4.APPV_PRCSS_DT FROM FCM0019M T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T2 ON T1.MEM_ACC_ID = T2.MEM_ACC_ID LEFT JOIN FCM0004M T4 ON T1.APPV_PRCSS_NO = T4.APPV_PRCSS_NO WHERE CLM_TYPE = 'J5') T WHERE 1=1
AND T.CLM_MONTH = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{clmMonth}, 'MM/YYYY'), 'YYYYMM')
AND T.MEM_ACC_ID LIKE '%' || #{memAccID} || '%'
AND T.APPV_PRCSS_STUS_CODE IN
#{item}
ORDER BY T.CLM_NO, T.CLM_MONTH, T.REQST_DT
/* scmActivityFundMapper.selectTaxCodeScmActivityFundFlag */ SELECT TAX_CODE , TAX_NAME FROM FCM0007C WHERE SCM_FUND_FLAG = 'X'

/* scmActivityFundMapper.selectNextClmNo */ SELECT 'J5' || TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') || NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 7, 4) + 1), 'FM0000'), '0001') AS CLM_NO FROM FCM0019M WHERE SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 3, 4) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm')
/* scmActivityFundMapper.selectNextClmSeq */ SELECT NVL(MAX(CLM_SEQ) + 1, 1) AS CLM_SEQ FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}

/* scmActivityFundMapper.selectScmActivityFundItems */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T3.COST_CENTR, T3.COST_CENTR_NAME, T3.MEM_ACC_ID, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, T4.MEM_ACC_ID AS SUPPLIR, T1.SUPPLIR AS SUPPLIR_NAME, T1.INVC_TYPE, ( CASE T1.INVC_TYPE WHEN 'F' THEN 'Full Tax invoice' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Simplified Tax invoice' END ) AS INVC_TYPE_NAME, T1.INVC_NO, TO_CHAR(T1.INVC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INVC_DT, T1.GST_RGIST_NO, T1.TAX_CODE, T2.TAX_NAME, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T1.EXP_DESC, T3.TOT_AMT AS ALL_TOT_AMT, T3.APPV_PRCSS_NO FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0007C T2 ON T1.TAX_CODE = T2.TAX_CODE LEFT JOIN FCM0019M T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T4 ON T1.SUPPLIR = T4.MEM_ACC_NAME WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} ORDER BY T1.CLM_SEQ

/* scmActivityFundMapper.selectScmActivityFundInfo */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T3.COST_CENTR, T3.COST_CENTR_NAME, T3.MEM_ACC_ID, T4.MEM_ACC_NAME, T3.BANK_CODE, T3.BANK_ACC_NO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T3.CLM_MONTH, 'YYYYMM'), 'MM/YYYY') AS CLM_MONTH, T3.TOT_AMT AS ALL_TOT_AMT, T3.APPV_PRCSS_NO, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, T5.MEM_ACC_ID AS SUPPLIR, T1.SUPPLIR AS SUPPLIR_NAME, T1.INVC_TYPE, T1.INVC_NO, TO_CHAR(T1.INVC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INVC_DT, T1.GST_RGIST_NO, T1.TAX_CODE, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T1.EXP_DESC, T2.CAR_MILAG_DT, T2.LOC_FROM, T2.LOC_TO, T2.CAR_MILAG, T2.CAR_MILAG_AMT, T2.TOLL_AMT, T2.PARKING_AMT, T2.PURPOSE FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0021D T2 ON T1.CLM_NO = T2.CLM_NO LEFT JOIN FCM0019M T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T4 ON T3.MEM_ACC_ID = T4.MEM_ACC_ID LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T5 ON T1.SUPPLIR = T4.MEM_ACC_NAME WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND T1.CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}

/* scmActivityFundMapper.selectAttachList */ SELECT T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,T1.ATCH_FILE_ID ,T2.ATCH_FILE_NAME FROM SYS0070M T1 LEFT JOIN SYS0071D T2 ON T1.ATCH_FILE_ID = T2.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{atchFileGrpId} ORDER BY T1.ATCH_FILE_ID
mapper.delete: /* staffClaimMapper.deleteScmActivityFundExpItem */ DELETE FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}
mapper.update: /* staffClaimMapper.updateScmActivityFundExpTotAmt */ UPDATE FCM0019M SET TOT_AMT = #{allTotAmt} WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}
